docs.title: Toy GPT Repository
docs.text: This repo is an example of a next-token prediction model, illustrating how language models are trained and used.

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text:
• README.md in the repository root for the home page
  • SETUP.md for setup and workflow
  • SE_MANIFEST.toml for intent, scope, and declared training corpus

docs.title: API Reference
docs.text:
This repository uses the toy_gpt_train package for core functionality.

For API documentation, see the reference implementation:

  • toy_gpt_train API Reference

docs.title: This Repository
docs.text:
This repository provides:

  • Corpus: corpus/001_animals.txt - structured animal sentences
  • Wrappers: Thin modules that configure paths and run demos
  • Artifacts: Pretrained model outputs in artifacts/

No new public API is exported beyond re-exports from toy_gpt_train.
